summary: Marketing Coordinator with 10 years of experience, proactive team player focused on delivering high quality service, detail-oriented, well organized and self-motivated. Strong in process improvement, time management, and managing multiple tasks under pressure; skilled at developing and maintaining effective communication with clients, peers and administrative staff.

experience.title: Marketing Coordinator
experience.description: Coordinate and implement monthly US promotional circulars adaptations to PR Market; translate and adapt corporate material; manage budget distributions with Marketing Manager; forecast sales and profit; conduct competitive research; support PR market pricing strategy; provide project management; coordinate creation and printing of internal marketing materials; coordinate with graphics department; assist 11 PR Stores for events; maintain effective communications with internal and external partners.

experience.title: Marketing Coordinator
experience.description: Coordinate marketing projects and activities; support marketing department; prepare marketing reports; develop marketing communications campaigns; plan marketing and advertising strategies and promotional presentations; ensure alignment with marketing strategies; manage information flow and dissemination; produce brochures, flyers and exhibition-related materials; determine budget and manage expenses; develop communications strategy for key media contacts and customer references; research media coverage and industry trends; improve communication efficiencies; support 13 dealer partners; organize branded items and artwork production; track advertising agency requests and billings; fulfill new requests.

experience.title: Events & Public Relations Coordinator
experience.description: Coordinate events such as trainings, launches, business meetings and trade shows; site selection and contract negotiation; manage registration databases and on-site logistics; coordinate event logistics, including registration, attendee tracking, presentations, materials support and pre- and post-event evaluations; work with hotels and vendors; calculate budgets; promote products and services through PR; create and deliver press releases, media relations content and corporate newsletters; update web pages with new product information, upcoming events and news; develop budget ROI reports; maintain inventory of promotional materials; support in-house marketing and design team; track competitor publicity and prepare comparative reports.

experience.title: Public Relations Intern
experience.description: Create public relations pieces such as news releases and media kits; plan and execute advertising campaigns using social media (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube); update web pages with new product information, upcoming events and news.

education.degree: BA in Communication, Public Relations and Advertising
education.school: University Of Puerto Rico - RÃ­o Piedras
